HDG.BC.content: man attends (achtet) either to his needs (braucht) or what he can do w/out; latter not calculation, considers everything from a standpoint limited to essential: only apparent restriction, really a release into expanse of demands that befit man’s essence, attending to dispensable (Entbehrliche) brings man into simplicity, totally other (ganz anderen) domain [no calculation = limited to essential?]

HDG.BC.content: philosophical critique of contemporary physics [science], reflection can’t limit itself to examination of “law of causality” > predictability a principle of knowledge of beings, so even physics converts ontological law into “epistemological principle” (an error, a fall), “quantum metaphysics” > science helps indicate “being” as most intelligible (hardly noticed attitude at bottom of claim of physics)

HDG.BC.content: only “beings” remain: what does that mean? > stand btwn 2 equally unavoidable limits: 1) we cast being away from us (das Sein wird von uns verworfen [cf. Freud foreclosure]) when we say Being “is” 2) can never disavow “Being” & “is” wherever we experience a being [“is” method]

HDG.MA.content: meditative thinking (like calculative thinking [?]), requires greater effort, demands more practice [askesis], must be cared for, must wait > anyone can follow path of meditative thinking in own manner, w/in own limits: man is a thinking/meditating being

HDG.DL.content: confusion [nihilistic reading of Heidegger] re: name “Being,” because belongs to patrimony (Eigentum) of Sprache of metaphysics > bring out essence of metaphysics: bring metaphysics w/in its own limits > overcoming metaphysics: neither destruction (Zerstörung) nor denial (Verleugnung) of metaphysics (intend anything else would be childish, demean history)

HDG.DL.content: to think Greeks in even more Greek manner doesn’t mean better than them: great thinking understands itself best, i.e. understands itself, w/in limits set for it (zugemessenen Grenzen) > to think more originally than Greeks: to think the unthought clearing (Lichten), the occurrence (Ereignis) [?] of emergence (Hervorkommen) into openness (Lichte) [?], unconcealedness (appearance of that which is present)

HDG.WL.content: Saying has already overtaken (überholt) destructiveness of information-language because Appropriation can’t be commandeered (Unbestellbaren des Ereignisses)? > all true language (eigentliche Sprache), because sent/assigned/destined (geschickt) by way-making of Saying, is in the nature of destiny (dadurch geschicklich) > no natural language of human w/out destiny, all language is historical > information-language too is historical, in sense of limits of present era > this era begins nothing new, only carries the old aspects of modern age to the extreme
